plot: Prince Charming works the night shift in a morgue and loathes it, but when Snow White rolls in on a gurney, he's struck. How bad do the bad guys have to be, for the hero to keep his title?
title: Villudýr
plot_es: Prince Charming works the night shift in a morgue and loathes it, but when Snow White rolls in on a gurney, he's struck. How bad do the bad guys have to be, for the hero to keep his title?
